I didn't expect this Tesco Express to be so big. You go down the escalators and I love how spacious and relaxed it was inside. I was after mushrooms and pleased there was a large selection.

Also, the fridge desserts were impressive, though I was good and didn't get anything.

The fresh fruit were reasonably priced too and I was happy with the large tub of raspberries.

One of the fridges had discounted items and there were quite a few things to choose from.

The crisps were a bit confusing and some were placed in different areas. I was looking for Doritos Tangy Cheese. They had Original, Chilli and Burger King Whopper on one stand. Then some other Doritos flavours at another. Neither had Tangy Cheese, which meant my shopping basket was healthier and I saved some money. In the crisp aisle, there weren't any Doritos. I do like buying Doritos at Tesco with my club card. It costs much more at other supermarkets.

Also half the registers weren't working and mine couldn't give a receipt.

I'm also a fan of the fresh pasta and the price seems competitive compared to other supermarkets.

I stopped shopping at Tesco for a few years, but might come back to this one again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQ-455ybaKaATqJdXIoLdUZBSc1zAJdf4gzzrA&fid=0x0:0x508f8b59a082fc99"],"When":"2023-10-28"},{"Name":"Sonia Cairney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLf8cwUL1s48iUzC-6MRq7gb0vyQ6T0Rl9DMmK9eJx-Yi32rg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I have been shopping in this store since it opened. While waiting, I briefly looked at the food section to decide what I would have later before returning to my seat.

I tried to explain that my friend would be arriving shortly and ordering, after which I would also be ordering, but the staff member walked away before I could finish. The cookie has the right amount of crunch, with a soft, buttery centre and generous chunks of melted chocolate chips. The cookie is simple yet flawlessly executed and always served with a smile from the friendly staff. Wow!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgd_FES20u7PS6Hzrc0Y4AUoX4hMafj_68SC78tmkFWC8koA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Quite confrontational in here. I ordered an extra hot oat latte, which was the same as the person before me.

An Oat latte was called out, and soon after, so was the extra hot. As soon as I heard, I went up to the counter and mentioned this. The barrister asked if the coffee was hot enough, to which I responded no. She then made a remark and said: "Well, it was because you took someone else's" I reminded her that the lady infront had the same order. To which she responded: "There's a BIG difference!" I asked if there was a problem making my coffee hotter?

Honestly,  I have never had this issue before. In no way have I ever been made to feel uncomfortable at the numerous Pret's I have visited.

The Barrister was also quite huffy,  and was about to reuse the cap that fell on the floor!

In addition, I was 1/3 people in the store. I didn't see the need for this type of behaviour.

When visiting this store, the servers are confrontational.  So, word of advice, DO NOT TAKE THE WRONG ORDER, EVEN IF IT SOUNDS SIMILAR TO YOURS! RECONFIRM OTHERWISE THEY'LL HIT YOU WITH A FEW SNIDE COMMENTS.

I paid for my coffee it wasn't free and I mistook someone else's order for mine.

Discipline on behaviours comes to mind, as does good customer service!!

That's all, thanks!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwtfmWkZKo-0Wj742Dqo8zIyZD92VfyGHzEHRy&fid=0x0:0x6ccd1c6acc7fa549"],"When":"2024-4-10"},{"Name":"Teba Majeed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXViwIOPGhJgEVVmHWlusk_E4BY5omL9yh3K1zYwY0drUf-k1OU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always love to go to Pret A Manger, although I think it means ‚Äúready to eat‚Äù in French ( I speak a little bit of French ) they have very good vegetarian options which are delicious, and also they are very quick when they work, I have one concern though‚Ä¶ they have the new hot chocolate ‚Äú marry berry hot chocolate ‚Äú - I think - and in the ads it has whipped cream, but in reality, they always run out of it,","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSkaqQALBkyFHHkQ5AZGVXjPj_prnzTmx4sOWs&fid=0x0:0x6ccd1c6acc7fa549"],"When":"2023-12-9"},{"Name":"David Simpson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2AkKIzHXVqwcdN0s8S_SUE2Gsk0LdYBiVh_zBwtvQH-tHnw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service from the whole team who memorised my order of a white strong cappuccino the first time I ordered it and provide amazing service. i would highly recommend having a look as the staff are so lovely and friendly but not too pushy which is amazing!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Reardon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbr8d6kBvPMulSIt-HdDhPJbFbndnFlGU8Xv-VYwvSNRSc89H6_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We visited the cafe on the fifth floor for a sandwich and a pot of tea on a Friday afternoon. Did have question over cleanliness of the china but that was dealt with in a polite manner. Tea was hot and falvoursome.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Saiful Islam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNn-ILGpl0G1SJNrLMXw8gtp9hilavSJPW9lrGuChOE1LKMlsi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"John Lewis is Oxford Circus amazing department store, in Londons west end with thousands of different products in many  sections such as clothing, electronics etc,
we entered ground floor entrance. I noticed  the perfume area, as we strolled through the store, feeling quite peckish, from previous visits to the store had knowledge that they served hot food and beverages and had also been and had tea and cake which is amazing it was now time to try John Lewis‚Äòs hot, my friend wanted to try fish and chips, and I felt to go for the leek and soup, I also wanted to try chunky chips and the fresh bread roll, the first waitress who served us behind the fish and chips counter was a Oriental lady, who ignored us twice, and then walked off to the back when we wanted to order.
The second lady serving the hot food was super friendly.
She even helped us carry the food tray to the table she was amazing and very helpful
My friend also ordered a pot of tea and I had water.
Unfortunately, the cod was very cold. The chips were nice and warm. My soup was piping hot. I feel sometimes I‚Äôm lucky because I seem to always get the good end of the meal. We shared the breadstick. I asked my friend how his fish was he told me it‚Äôs okay It‚Äôs edible. The taste must‚Äôve been nice, but it was a bit cold,
I wanted my friend to taste the soup and let him share some of my soup in a separate bowl.
Although he did manage to finish the fish chip peas and the butter bread I gave him,
I really enjoyed my soup, It was tasty fresh hot full of flavour the bread was soft and fresh with my favourite butter Anchor, my friend told me his Tea was amazing, the and sandwich options healthy options will definitely be back to try some of the other dishes again. The pie looked amazing, and we decided to go for some desserts as this was John Lewis speciality, last time we had the double chocolate cake which was amazing and we stuck to one of the favourites cherry and raisin cake as it was so good.
The cake was so delicious and perfectly baked soft filling of vanilla cherry sauce was dreamy we both enjoyed the water very hydrating after the cake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQOEpgu4ZxUMIPHVqt6_0hF78PTBNAFQh_LV67&fid=0x0:0x42e145a62bba2664"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Gary Jelks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZtYIusKtYjpQYMIGVtNXFtxBaBlXDhpmmrCYp_Vrl4TTesA8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Great place to shop.
7 floors of goods to choose from.
High end goods at reasonable prices.
Staff friendly and helpful.
Restaurant on floor 5 is good value.
Good choice of electrical goods and toys.
Ground floor filled with perfume and make up concessions.
Been many times and will continue to return.

Sadly a return visit at the end of 2024 summed up the decline of this once great store.
We wanted an iron and the website showed 12 in stock in store. We went to the kitchen department and there were none on display. The Shop assistant said they were sold out. We went to the cash desk and asked them to check their stock levels as the shop assistant did not offer to check.
